title: Our Core Team
content: Meet the dedicated professionals leading Cyberbay's mission to revolutionize cybersecurity

core.name: Felix Kan
core.title: CEO & Co-Founder
core.description: Felix has over a decade of experience as an ethical hacker. Before founding Cyberbay, Felix spent 15 years at PwC focused on cybersecurity consulting and co-founded innovative solutions like DarkLab, Colound, Hackday, and Hackbot.

core.name: Galina Kho
core.title: Chief Strategy Officer
core.description: Galina brings 18 years of expertise in product marketing, brand management, and market research to Cyberbay, where she focuses on partnerships and ecosystem growth strategy.

core.name: Brett Ngo
core.title: Tech Lead
core.description: Brett is a Tech Lead at Cyberbay with expertise in Security and Compliance. He has 15+ years of experience in Security/Compliance and Development. He leads a team that builds a cutting-edge platform.

core.name: Zara Amirzade
core.title: Head of Design
core.description: Zara is a dynamic Product Designer and design leader with over 7 years of experience across diverse industries, including cybersecurity, AI systems, sustainability, cryptocurrency, and IT outsourcing.

core.name: Natalie Chan
core.title: Product Manager
core.description: Natalie is a Product Management professional with a background in psychology from University College London (UCL). Currently working in the cybersecurity industry, Natalie combines her expertise in human-computer interaction (HCI).
